title: Silent Song
description: His love was her secret Alice always saw his talent, his passion. She saw his soul every time he played, and she was obsessed with it. Maybe even enamored. That’s why she kept sneaking into his practices, risking her reputation every night just to listen to him. But was that tenuous, furtive connection enough of a reason to take the final step? Could she stand by his side, when that meant standing alone? Her love was his strength But no secret can stay hidden forever. When Keith is drawn into composing the soundtrack for the high school play Alice is starring, their worlds crash together and she must make her is Keith worth risking it all? Can they have something strong enough to withstand not only their differences, but also the malicious darkness that seems to be entwined with their performance of Wilde’s Lady Windermere’s Fan?
author: Ron C. Nieto
